name: context-evaluator
description: CLI tool and web app to evaluate AGENTS.md files using AI agents

scripts.dev: bun run generate:version && (cd frontend && bun run css:build) && (bun --hot src/index.ts api &) && bun --hot frontend/server.ts
scripts.dev:cloud: bun run generate:version && (cd frontend && bun run css:build) && (bun --hot src/index.ts api --cloud &) && bun --hot frontend/server.ts
scripts.dev:api: bun run generate:version && bun --hot src/index.ts api
scripts.dev:frontend: (cd frontend && bun run css:build) && bun --hot frontend/server.ts
scripts.dev:cli: bun run generate:version && bun src/index.ts cli evaluate --claude
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && rm -rf frontend/dist && rm -f src/embedded/frontend-assets.ts src/embedded/prompts-assets.ts
scripts.build: bun run clean && bun run generate:version && bun run build:frontend && bun run generate:embedded && bun run build:binaries
scripts.build:binaries: bun run build:bin:darwin-arm64 && bun run build:bin:darwin-x64 && bun run build:bin:linux-x64 && bun run build:bin:windows-x64
